description:
Outside: In 2019 Flooid wanted to move to being Product oriented and I joined as an outside Consultant to design and plan that transformation.

Inside: In August 2020 I moved inside, becoming SVP of Global Engineering, where I'm starting to apply the theory into practice and navigate the challenges of transforming engineering with a full backlog in all areas.

This is the story of what happened

SPEAKER:
Ryan Bryers
Senior Vice President Of Global Engineering at Flooid

Ryan has worked for the last 6 years at the C-Level as both employee and consultant helping organisations to adopt a more Digital way of working, be smarter through the use of cloud and to evolve and transform to be better versions of themselves. With a focus on making small changes often, Ryan looks towards micro-change as opposed to the often scary view of the macro-change.

**
A link to the recording of this Talk will be put in the Comments shortly after it takes place
title: Client Spotlight: Outside to In - a story of Transformation. Ryan Bryers, Flooid
